snippet: Marvin Kloss of the University of South Florida made four field goals to help the East beat the West, 19-3, in the East-West Shrine Classic in St. Petersburg, Fla.
abstract: Indianapolis Colts running back Trent Richardson will miss AFC championship game against New England Patriots because of personal reasons; other NFL and college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marvin Kloss of the University of South Florida made four field goals to help the East beat the West, 19-3, in the East-West Shrine Classic in St. Petersburg, Fla.
